name: m0rpheus
description: A service for downloading Deezer, Spotify and Tidal music (or album) to your Onedrive.

M0RPHEUS_ACCESS_KEY.description: Random string for checking authorization on webhook request.

IFTTT_WEBHOOK_KEY.description: Key acquired from https://ifttt.com/maker_webhooks Documentation page.

ARL.description: ARL cookie value acquired from an Deezer account.
